cookie.message: This website uses Google Analytics to anonymously collect browsing data.

dataLoader.pasteMessage: Copy and paste your data from other applications or websites. You can use tabular (TSV, CSV, DSV) or JSON data.
dataLoader.uploadMessage: You can load tabular (TSV, CSV, DSV) or JSON data.
dataLoader.sparqlMessage: Load data with a SparQL query
dataLoader.urlMessage: Enter a web address (URL) pointing to the data (e.g. a public Dropbox file, a public API, ...). Please, be sure the server is CORS-enabled.
dataLoader.successMessage: {{count}} rows ({{cells}} cells) have been successfully parsed, now you can choose a chart!
dataLoader.parsed: have been successfully parsed, now you can choose a chart!

footer.description: RAWGraphs is an open source project designed and developed by

screenSizeAlert.title: Welcome to the new RAWGraphs!
screenSizeAlert.message: RAWGraphs 2.0 is designed for bigger screens!
screenSizeAlert.messageSlightly: RAWGraphs 2.0 is designed for slightly bigger screens!
screenSizeAlert.comeback: to come back at a better time.
screenSizeAlert.touchNotSupported: Touch devices are not fully supported yet.

chartOptions.finalOutput: The final output will be {{width}}px * {{height}}px including the legend.

customChartLoader.title: Load custom chart
customChartLoader.placeholderNpm: Load UMD or AMD JS File from NPM
customChartLoader.placeholderUrl: Load UMD or AMD JS File from URL
customChartLoader.documentation: Do you want to know how to create a custom chart?

customChartWarn.title: Warning!
customChartWarn.message: You are about to execute third party JavaScript continue at your own risk.
